text: 9|58|(napiyē!) Nīr tāṉaṅkaḷaip paṅkiṭuvatil pārapaṭcamuṭaiyavar eṉṟu um'maik kuṟai kūṟupavarkaḷum avarkaḷil palar irukkiṉṟaṉar. (Avarkaḷ viruppappaṭi) atiliruntu avarkaḷukkuk koṭukkappaṭṭāl avarkaḷ tiruptiyaṭaikiṉṟaṉar. Atiliruntu (avarkaḷ viruppappaṭi) koṭukkappaṭāviṭṭālō āttiram koḷkiṉṟaṉar
